message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'd be happy to pay $150 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $175.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $175 is still a bit more than my budget.  I'm happy to pay $160, which is a fair compromise.  What do you say?
I understand that $175 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $170. This is my best price, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
